200.title: OK
200.message: If you want to upload your own files, check out safe.fiery.me.

400.title: Bad request
400.message: The server cannot process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.

401.title: Unauthorized
401.message: The requested resource requires an authentication.

403.title: Access denied
403.message: The requested resource requires an authentication.

404.title: Resource not found
404.message: The requested resource could not be found.

429.title: Too many request
429.message: Please slow down and try again in a while.

500.title: Webservice currently unavailable
500.message:
An unexpected condition was encountered.
Our service team has been dispatched to bring it back online.

501.title: Not implemented
501.message: The webserver cannot recognize the request method.

502.title: Webservice currently unavailable
502.message:
We've got some trouble with our backend upstream cluster.
Our service team has been dispatched to bring it back online.

503.title: Webservice currently unavailable
503.message:
We've got some trouble with our backend upstream cluster.
Our service team has been dispatched to bring it back online.

520.title: Origin error - unknown host
520.message: The requested hostname is not routed. Use only hostnames to access resources.

521.title: Webservice currently unavailable
521.message:
We've got some trouble with our backend upstream cluster.
Our service team has been dispatched to bring it back online.

533.title: Scheduled Maintenance
533.message:
This site is currently down for maintenance.
Our service team is working hard to bring it back online soon.
